page.title: 02Religion Littlebourne Area
page.content: Each village has its own Church, Ickham behind its green,Wickhambreux by the green,Littlebourne opposite the School. Each village has its own PCC. St. Vincent Littlebourne has a spire and bell tower for 6 bells which are rung twice each Sunday, for weddings and festivals. Littlebourne Vicar lives in a new vicarage next to the Church, is assisted by Readers, Wardens, Sidesmen and Sacristan. Eucharist is at 8 and 10-30 am each Sunday and 9-30 Wednesdays. There is also Evensong at 6-30. A fine choir and organist leads the singing at 10-30 and 6-30 services.Special services are held at Harvest and on Palm Sunday there is a Donkey. A book and produce sale is held after Harvest as is the Harvest Supper. There is also a Christmas Bazaar.
